events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's selection state changes. You can pull out the new checked state by accessing `event.target.checked` (boolean).
events.description_zh: 当元素的选择状态发生更改时调用的处理程序。您可以通过访问“event.target.checked”（布尔值）来提取新的选中状态。

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's selection state changes.
events.description_zh: 当元素的选择状态发生更改时调用的处理程序。

icon.description: The icon to be displayed when the checkbox is checked.
icon.description_zh: 选中该复选框时要显示的图标。

value.description: The value of the checkbox element, used when submitting an HTML form.
value.description_zh: 提交 HTML 表单时使用的 checkbox 元素的值。

name.description: The name of the checkbox element, used when submitting an HTML form.
name.description_zh: 提交 HTML 表单时使用的复选框元素的名称。

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

lineThrough.description: Whether the label should be crossed out.

isSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (controlled).

defaultSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (uncontrolled).
defaultSelected.description_zh: 是否应选择元素（不受控制）。

isRequired.description: Whether user checkbox is required on the checkbox before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 表单提交前的复选框是否需要用户复选框。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the checkbox can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 复选框是否可以被选中，但不能由用户更改。

isIndeterminate.description: Indeterminism is presentational only. The indeterminate visual representation remains regardless of user interaction.
isIndeterminate.description_zh: 不确定性只是表现性的。无论用户交互如何，不确定的视觉表示都会保持不变。

validationState.description: Whether the checkbox should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.
validationState.description_zh: 复选框是否应显示其“有效”或“无效”的视觉样式。（**已弃用**）请改用 **isInvalid**。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the animation should be disabled.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the checkbox slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为复选框插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Checkbox wrapper, it handles alignment, placement, and general appearance.
slots.description_zh: 复选框包装器，它处理对齐方式、位置和一般外观。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: An inner container that includes styles for relative positioning, flex properties, overflow handling and managing hover and selected states.
slots.description_zh: 一个内部容器，包括用于相对定位、弯曲属性、溢出处理以及管理悬停和选定状态的样式。

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Icon within the checkbox, controlling size, visibility, and changes when checked.
slots.description_zh: 复选框内的图标，控制大小、可见性和选中时的更改。

slots.name: label
slots.description: The text associated with the checkbox.
